name: AS_GSS_TMG_CONS_templateAuditFields
description: The list of CDT fields that are audited for templates/process setup
sail_code:
/* Add the fields that need to be displayed in the template / checklist history in the front end. Make sure to update the order in AS_GSS_TMG_DSP_displayAuditModificationForTemplate and AS_GSS_TMG_DSP_displayAuditModificationForReviews when any fields are added/ removed from here*/
{
  "templateName",
  "templateDesc",
  "groupAssignee",
  "taskDesc",
  "taskRef.taskRefId",
  "taskRefId_precedent",
  "groupId_precedent",
  "duration",
  "durationUnit.refDataId",
  "noOfDaysFromStart",
  "operation.refDataId",
  "thresholdAmount",
  "docTemplate.documentTemplateId"
}
